author: wtopstaff
title: Champions Tour Schedule
text:
By The Associated Press October 26, 2015 10:46 am 
Jan. 23-25 — Mitsubishi Electric Championship (Miguel Angel Jimenez) 
Feb. 6-8 — Allianz Championship (Paul Goydos) 
Feb. 13-15 — ACE Group Classic (Lee Janzen) 
March 20-22 — Tucson Conquistadores Classic (Marco Dawson) 
March 27-29 — Mississippi Gulf Resort Classic (David Frost) 
April 17-19 — Greater Gwinnett Championship (Olin Browne) 
April 24-26 — Bass Pro Shops Legends of Golf at Big Cedar Lodge (Billy Andrade/Joe Durant) 
May 1-3 — Insperity Invitational (Ian Woosnam) 
May 14-17 — Regions Tradition (Jeff Maggert) 
May 21-24 — Senior PGA Championship (Colin Montgomerie) 
June 5-7 — Principal Charity Classic (Mark Calcavecchia) 
June 11-14 — Constellation Senior Players Championship (Bernhard Langer) 
June 25-28 — U.S. Senior Open Championship (Jeff Maggert) 
July 10-12 — Encompass Championship (Jerry Smith) 
July 23-26 — The Senior Open Championship (Marco Dawson) 
July 31-Aug 2 — 3M Championship (Kenny Perry) 
Aug. 7-9 — Shaw Charity Classic (Jeff Maggert) 
Aug. 21-23 — Boeing Classic (Billy Andrade) 
Aug. 28-30 — Dick’s Sporting Goods Open (Jeff Maggert) 
Sept. 25-27 — Nature Valley First Tee Open (Esteban Toledo) 
Oct. 9-11 — SAS Championship (Tom Lehman) 
Oct. 16-18 — San Antonio Championship (Bernhard Langer) 
Oct. 30-Nov 1 — Toshiba Classic, Newport Beach CC, Newport Beach, Calif. 
Nov. 5-8 — Charles Schwab Cup Championship, Desert Mountain Club (Cochise), Scottsdale, Ariz. 
Dec. 1-4 — Champions Tour Q-School, TPC Scottsdale (Champions), Scottsdale, Ariz. 
Dec. 12-13 — PNC Father Son Challenge, Ritz-Carlton GC, Orlando, Fla. Topics:
